attributes.review: At first everything was going okay but out of no where I was getting all sorts of horrifying pictures sent to my phone. I had no idea what was goin on but there were all sorts of obscure photos being sent to me! This app is absolutely disgusting and would urge you to stay away from it.
attributes.title: Do NOT under any circumstances download this app

attributes.review: This is BY FAR the worst app on my phone, and I’ve got HUNDREDS!!!!!!!  Took WELL over a month to load and when it did, it didn’t even work!! I’m disgusted and appalled. I thought maybe he could manage to do ONE THING right, but this app is just another one of our president’s many misses. Headachingly awful and a must-NEVER-download for any self respecting American
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!!

attributes.review: this app took up SO MUCH if my battery it was insane🤬 AND they give false information🙀🤯🤯 10/10 would NOT recommend. and the radiation the app gives off might KILL you 🤭🤯i felt weak, confused🤔, starting fainting, i BLED from my nose and gums, and sores on my skin. also it asked for my number and idk abt you but a pedo 🥳having my number😡 make me ✨uncomfy✨ 😾 the app is a no go for me sir✋😤
attributes.title: ALMOST DIED

attributes.review: This app takes a super long time to load and was really glitchy. My phone completely slowed down and my battery started to have a super short life. This started happening as soon as I downloaded it and I had to keep deleting it and re-downloading it. If you want to keep your phone in good quality, DONT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.title: So weird

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see the dRaMa that the trump administration had to say 🥱 but when it asked for my phone number I had enough! Trump is a married man! And I am a ✨𝑚𝑖𝑛𝑜𝑟✨!! Not like it’s anything new to him :/ this app reached every expectation I had of it— ✨𝑑𝑖𝑠𝑔𝑢𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔✨
If it were possible I would give it no stars, but i guess apple is trying to keep me humble :/
attributes.title: Disgusting!

attributes.review: This app made me feel very uncomfortable with the violent language it was using and I tried to preach my wonderful president but it started to over heat my phone and it shut down for an hour and every time I tried getting back on it would do the same thing and I eventually had to buy a new phone.
attributes.title: Hurtful

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and would not stop glitching it was so complicated and I couldn’t read the small words overall this app messed with my phone and I know my dear Donald j Trump could never backstab me like this I know that this was a woman or a black because a white person could never do something this terrible 😡😡😡.
attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: I got this app hopeful, thinking it was going to help us, but the second I got it..It magically got deleted..I don’t know why but I don’t know if I should get it back again. I’m in TEARS of JOY and SADNESS, knowing magic indeed DOES WORK, but I’m upset the poor precious app..is gone. I can’t install it again knowing there might be a bug in it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. THE UNINSTALLING MAGIC MIGHT GET TO YOU TOO!!😱😱😦🤯🤯🤯🤯
attributes.title: I can’t anymore😭😭😭

attributes.review:
this app is terrible! don’t download! my cat exploded while she was pregnant and all of her babies died because of this app! i would sue trump if i could! my parents are frogs and now my sister is a koala and in the microwave! my dog had to get ear surgery because this app made all of the tvs in my neighborhood EXPLODE. i do NOT reccomend EVER.

edit: MY MOM IS A COW NOW. i also forgot to mention that this app took 73 WEEKS FOR IT TO DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: DO NOT RECCOMEND😡😡😡

attributes.review: This app embodies our President Trump 🤩✨🧚🏼‍♂️ We all love this small handed man, and I’m glad they did him right by making this the orangest, most ignorant, mislead app on the AppStore 💯 What else could the good people ask for? Rights, the ability to live? No what we want is, ignorant Trump propaganda sent straight to our phones! Thank you Trump for making this available 🙏🏻
attributes.title: Just like my president 🤩
